location.physicalLocation: British Library: India Office Records and Private Papers

titleInfo.title: Letter from James Farish, Assistant Secretary to the Government, Bombay, to Lieutenant William Bruce, Acting Resident, Bushire

mods.abstract: Letter encloses an extract from a letter, dated 10 October 1810, from the Court of Directors of the East India Company, regarding the Board of Agriculture's wish that specimens of the Cashmerian sheep be sent over to Britain. Farish asks Bruce to procure some sheep on behalf of the Company.
